title: Mining amethyst

properties.name: description
properties.value: Amethyst is currently the highest level ore players can mine. It is used in the creation of high-level ranging ammo. At high Mining levels, players can expect to mine anywhere from 80 to 100 amethyst per hour for profits of 351,680-439,600 coins. Players may wish to bring a chisel with them to craft amethyst bolt tips, arrowtips, javelin heads or  dart tips. These stack in your inventory allowing you to avoid banking indefinitely, further decreasing the intensity. Due to the nature of the Grand Exchange, crafting Amethyst into other products can cut into the overall profit. Furthermore, crafting Amethyst is a longer process than simply banking the ore. Unidentified Minerals may be exchanged for mining gloves, superior mining gloves or soft clay packs, and bags full of gems at Belona's Mining Guild Mineral Exchange.

Mining amethyst
Requirements
Skills
92+
Items
Rune, Dragon or Crystal pickaxe
Quest
None
Other
Varrock armour 4, Expert mining gloves, Celestial or Elven signet (if using crystal pickaxe; optional), Celestial Ring (optional)
Results
ProfitExperience gained
403,605 19,200+
InputsOutputs (403,605)
90 × Amethyst (395,640)4.5 × Unidentified minerals (7,965)

Amethyst is currently the highest level ore players can mine. It is used in the creation of high-level ranging ammo. At high Mining levels, players can expect to mine anywhere from 80 to 100 amethyst per hour for profits of 351,680-439,600 coins. Players may wish to bring a chisel with them to craft amethyst bolt tips, arrowtips, javelin heads or dart tips. These stack in your inventory allowing you to avoid banking indefinitely, further decreasing the intensity. Due to the nature of the Grand Exchange, crafting Amethyst into other products can cut into the overall profit. Furthermore, crafting Amethyst is a longer process than simply banking the ore. Unidentified Minerals may be exchanged for mining gloves, superior mining gloves or soft clay packs, and bags full of gems at Belona's Mining Guild Mineral Exchange.

Level Item XP Profit Rel. Profit
83 Amethyst bolt tips x15 5,400 371,250 −24,390
85 Amethyst arrowtips x15 5,400 387,450 −8,190
87 Amethyst javelin heads x5 5,400 364,950 −30,690
89 Amethyst dart tip x8 5,400 394,560 −1,080
Name GP/Mineral
Soft clay pack 1,770
Bag full of gems 1,378.93
Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
